name: Tick Tock: A Tale for Two
description:
In Tick Tock: A Tale for Two you and your friend find yourself trapped in an eerie world created by the skilful clockmaker Amalie Ravn. Your mission is to escape! But to do so you need to navigate a mysterious, sinister clockwork world filled with secrets and cryptic puzzles. To find the truth and ultimately escape this place, you must combine the information on both playersâ€™ screens.

Prepare yourselves for a narrative adventure where your communication skills are put to the test. Shout out instructions, discuss what you see, and listen. But remember: time is ticking. 

Play on two devices, local or remotely, all you need is a voice connection.
intro:
Uncover the mystery of a missing sister.
A two-player co-op game played on two devices.
Play with a friend and tell each other what you see.
